1.content: Which Clan are you in?
1.title: The Clan?

11.content: You are Rainpaw, the newest apprentice of Thunderclan. You are a Blue-Gray She-cat with white ears and paws. It had just become morning when you wake up hearing a fellow apprentice talking about the tasks you two were gonna do. After a quick stretch you go out and grab a mouse from the fresh-kill pile. After all, you need all of the energy you're gonna get. Today, you're going to...
11.title: Rainpaw

choices: Silverpelt and Jaggedfang go to bed
Silverpelt goes to twolegplace for help
Jaggedfang steals some food from wind clan
12.content:
Silverpelt woke early from the wind freezing her back. She rolled over, trying to get warm, but the wind seemed to touch every part of her. She padded over to Jaggedfang, who was cleaning himself a few mouselengths away.

" I can't sleep," she whispered, " It's as if the cold is attacking me." Jaggedfang looked up at her. They suddenly heard a kit squeal, and they whipped their heads facing the nursery. Then they heard a loud groan from an elder.

" The cold is attacking everyone." said Jaggedfang. "The whole clan."

Silverpelt shivered, not just from the cold. "This leaf-bare will be heard..." she whispered.
12.title: ShadowClan

14.content:
Your name is Snowkit. Your a white kit with a silver tip on the tail. Your mom's name is Sparrowfeather and your dad's name is Clawtail. Your sister is a brown tabby. Her stripes are light brown. She has a pretty look. Her name is Rosekit. Your mom is a white tabby with black stripes. Your dad is a silver tom with ruffled fur. You and Rosekit are 4 moons.

You roll up a ball of moss and say to Rosekit, "Hey Rosekit, wanna play Mossball?" "Ok, how about we do it outside," She replied. You nod and you and Rosekit walk outside. Rosekit made you jump, "I go first!" You pass the ball to her and she bats it over your head. It lands in front of Clawtail and he bats it back to Rosekit. Then you hear a screech from outside of camp. Rosekit squealed and ran to Sparrowfeather. Clawtail pricked his ears and ran in the direction of the noise.

A few minutes later, he returns with a black tom with white paws. Blood was dripping from his neck all the way down to his right back leg. He was wounded very badly. That cat was Nightstar.

What do you do now?
14.title: Snowkit

choices: Nightstar is brought to the medicine den.
Your father brings him somewhere else...
141.content: Rosekit backs away, scared. You pad forward, as you were scared, yet curious. "What happened?" you ask your father. He replies, "Nightstar is injured. Go back to Sparrowflight with your sister. I'll bring him to Jaynose." Jaynose was the medicine cat of RiverClan. "O-ok," you reply back, before padding back to your mother and Rosekit.
141.title: Nightstar?  Are you ok?

info.brief_description: Leaf-fall is just the beginning of the Clans' hardships...
info.description: The Clans are going through a hard leaf-fall, but it's just the beginning of the worst moons of their lives.
